message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $12,000. I believe this product will be very beneficial for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. Would you consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is my bottom line. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be a valuable asset.
